articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Greetings to President of Turkmenistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Greetings to President of Turkmenistan
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Gurbanguly Berdymuhamedov, president of Turkmenistan, on January 10.
					 In the message he extended warm congratulations to the president and people of Turkmenistan on the 25th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Turkmenistan.
					
					 He wished the president success in his responsible work, expressing belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms in line with the ideal of independence, peace and friendship and interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Turkmen President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Greetings from Turkmen President
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greetings from Gurbanguly Berdymuhamedov, president of Turkmenistan, on January 10.
					 In the message the president sent sincere congratulations and the best wishes to Kim Jong Un and the people of the DPRK on behalf of the people and government of Turkmenistan and on his own behalf on the 25th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between Turkmenistan and the DPRK.
					
					 Noting that the two countries have maintained mutual respect and equality and friendly and cooperative relations in the common struggle for progress and development, the message went on:
					
					 Turkmenistan is interested in continuously boosting the bilateral relations and fruitful partnership with your country.
					
					 We are going to further expand the cooperation between the two countries.
					
					 I believe that the relations between Turkmenistan and the DPRK will as ever develop in the interests of the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Taking advantage of this occasion, I sincerely wish Your Excellency and friendly people of your country peace, wellbeing and prosperity.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to President of Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to President of Kyrgyzstan
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of sympathy to Almazbek Atambaev, president of Kyrgyzstan, as regards the crash of a cargo plane that caused heavy casualties and damages of dwelling houses in Kyrgyzstan.
					 The message expressed deep condolence and sympathy for the president, victims and their families, sincerely hoping that grief of the bereaved families and aftermath of the crash would be eradicated as soon as possible.

articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Cote d'Ivoire
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Cote d'Ivoire
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Amadou Gon Coulibaly upon his appointment as prime minister and head of the government of the Republic of Cote d'Ivoire.
					 The message wished him success in his work and expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: DPRK Vice-Premier Newly Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Vice-Premier Newly Appointed
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Jon Kwang Ho was newly appointed as vice-premier of the DPRK.
					 The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK released a decree in this regard on Tuesday.

articles.title: New Year Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Sudanese President
articles.content:
New Year Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Sudanese President
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greetings from Omar Hassan Ahmed Al-Bashir, president of Sudan, on Jan. 5.
					 The Sudanese president in his message said he deemed it a great pleasure to extend his heartfelt greetings to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the New Year.
					
					 The message wished him and his family and the energetic Korean people happiness and blessings in the year 2017 and also wished him great success in his work.

articles.title: Performance by Art Squad of C.C., Youth League
articles.content:
Performance by Art Squad of C.C., Youth League
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the C.C., Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League gave a performance "Always Straight Forward, Following the Party!" at the Central Youth Hall on Tuesday in celebration of the 71st anniversary of the Youth League.
					 Its numbers included a narrative poem "Youth League of Eternal Sun", a dance "Our Own Style Is Good" and a mixed quartet and chorus "Song of Youth".
					
					 The performers sang loudly of the feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who built the youth power, setting it as the most important state affair and a strategic line of revolution to give priority to the youth.
					
					 They also stressed that the history of prioritizing the youth and loving them created by the great leaders would continue under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 First Secretary of the C.C., Youth League Jon Yong Nam and its officials and youths and students enjoyed the performance.

articles.title: Technology of Green Architecture Applied to Construction
articles.content:
Technology of Green Architecture Applied to Construction
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is pushing forward the projects for completing the construction of Ryomyong Street at the highest level. 
					 According to an official concerned, the number of the completed flats exceeded 90 percent and the work to introduce technologies of energy-conserving and green architecture into construction has been dynamically propelled.
					
					 Scores of advanced technologies including the solar-guided lightning system, geotherm-heating technology and hydroponic cultivation technology are being introduced in construction.        
					
					 And more than 30 species of trees are planted in the street. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the infrastructure project for geothermal cooling-and-heating system is nearing the final stage.

articles.title: Successes Made in Increasing Electric-power Production
articles.content:
Successes Made in Increasing Electric-power Production 
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is directing big efforts to updating thermal and hydro-power plants and putting their production on a normal track.
					 The Pukchang Thermal Power Complex is pushing ahead with the work for creating the new generating capacity while drastically improving the technical capacity of pumps for circulating water by introducing tens of modern measuring equipment. 
					
					 A drive has been conducted at the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex and the East Pyongyang Thermal Power Plant to apply a new firing technology without heavy oil to boilers.
					
					 The integrated production system has been rounded off at the hydro-power stations.   
					
					 Meanwhile, the Transformer Substation Management Bureau has repaired more than 100 high-power transformers.

articles.title: University of Sciences Greets Its 50th Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
University of Sciences Greets Its 50th Founding Anniversary
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Fifty years have passed since the University of Sciences was founded in the DPRK on January 17, 1967. 
					 The university has developed into a pedigree establishment for training scientists and a prestigious scientific research center under the loving care of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Il Sung initiated the founding of the university and gave precious instructions for drawing up its curriculums and the distribution of graduates.
					
					 Kim Jong Il showed particular loving care for the teachers, researchers and students and took measures for providing material and technical foundations. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un has led the university to fully discharge its mission and duty as a pedigree establishment for training scientists and a prestigious scientific research center.
					
					 The university has turned into a prestigious scientific research group with more than 600 academic degree holders including people's scientists, merited scientists, candidate academicians, professors and doctors and hundreds of winners of the title of October 8 Model Professor.
					
					 Tens of scientists were awarded Order of Kim Il Sung, Order of Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Il Prize and the titles of twice DPRK hero and DPRK hero and labor hero as they made distinguished scientific and technological achievements while working at major scientific research institutions of the country after the graduating the university. It produced a student honored with master's degree, the first of its kind in Korea, and prestigious scientists of the international mathematics and physics circles and a young member of the World Academy of Sciences.
					
					 In recent ten years alone, it has developed hundreds of new subjects and put the contents of education on a practical, comprehensive and modern basis.
					
					 It made a great contribution to the country's science, technology and economic development and the improvement of the people's living standard by registering more than 3,000 sci-tech achievements which are of the state's significance.
					
					 The scientists and educators of the university are now concentrating their efforts on science and education with the ambition for taking the lead in realizing the Workers' Party of Korea's idea of building a sci-tech power and a talented nation this year, a year of science and education.

articles.title: Lots of Poems and Songs Created
articles.content:
Lots of Poems and Songs Created
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Writers of the DPRK active at different worksites of the country have created more than 100 poems and songs since the outset of the year.
					 Among them are poems "Hearty Response", "Your Son Is Standing on the Steel Front". They represent the feelings of the working people in different parts of the country whose hearts are burning with the resolution to live up with loyalty to the noble love shown by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un for the people by swearing to become a true servant faithful to them on the New Year's Day.
					
					 From the outset of the new year, those writers went to Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill, Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, the Chilgol vegetable farm in Mangyongdae District, where they handed aid materials to the employees and worked together with them. In this course they created a number of literary works with strong appeal.
					
					 Short poems "First Report on the New Year's Drive" and "How Turbine of Power Plant Is Operating " deal with the revolutionary spirit of the army and people of the DPRK to register greater successes and turn the heyday of the revolution into a golden age of prosperity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls on Youth to Perform Heroic Merits in All-out General Offensive
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls on Youth to Perform Heroic Merits in All-out General Offensive
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is  the Paektusan youth power demonstrating its might with the revolutionary and militant spirit of the young vanguard intensely loyal to the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), says  Rodong Sinmun on Tuesday in an editorial.
					 It is the goal of life of the young people in the great era of Kim Jong Un and their firm will to fully display resourcefulness and gallantry of the heroic youth in the all-out general offensive for building a socialist power, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is an unshakable faith of the youth to live like present-day Kim Hyok and Cha Kwang Su who unhesitatingly dedicate their lives to protecting the headquarters of the revolution, wholeheartedly trusting and following their leader and unconditionally and absolutely remaining true to his idea and leadership. 
					
					 The Korean young people are now fully exalting their honor of being giants of creation and heroes of the era in building a socialist power, fully armed with the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists ignite another war on this land, the young vanguard of Songun Korea will wipe out the aggressors to the last man so that there will be no one left to sign a surrender document.
					
					 This is the faith and will of the young people of the DPRK.
					
					 The on-going all-out general offensive is an indomitable one in which the youth are accelerating the victorious advance of socialism with the spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the great dynamic force, courageously weathering the stern tempest of history.
					
					 The work sites for a great upswing alive with the drive for creating the Mallima speed are the theaters of the heroic struggle of the masters of the Paektusan youth power and their sites for performing feats.
					
					 The editorial calls on all young people to perform heroic exploits startling the world at the head of the all-out general offensive this year single-mindedly united close around respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns Those Challenging DPRK of Severe Punishment
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns Those Challenging DPRK of Severe Punishment
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet military in the recent "2017 working plan for the Ministry of Defense" asserted the need to finish the formation of a special brigade for "removing the war command of the north" within this year, two years earlier  than scheduled. It also disclosed that the brigade would have 1 000-2 000 service members and operatives of the U.S. SOF would participate in brigade's operation and it would be carried out by various forms and methods for "eliminating the war command of the north" with special aircraft, submarines and other latest equipment involved. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Lurking behind the warmongers' stepped-up moves to wind up the formation of the above-said brigade is a cynical ploy to paint the DPRK's sincere efforts as "camouflaged peace offensive" and divert elsewhere the public attention focused on the impeachment of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 Their formation of such brigade is, in fact, an undisguised war declaration against the DPRK.
					
					 Those who dare challenge the supreme headquarters of the DPRK will not be able to escape a merciless punishment.
					
					 The special brigade will be a primary target of the DPRK's ultra-precision strike means and those who mapped out the formation and involved in it will be wiped out before any others.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces should clearly understand unimaginable punishment of the DPRK's service personnel and people and stop going reckless.
					
					 The puppet forces' early formation of the special brigade is now under way at the prodding of the Obama group.
					
					 The U.S. rash action would only prompt the DPRK to facilitate the process of bolstering up its nuclear force at a high level.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Lift Illegal Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Lift Illegal Sanctions against DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Successive U.S. administrations have put emphasis on isolating and stifling the DPRK through military threat and sanctions in shaping their policy towards the DPRK and this remains unchanged at present, observes Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary.
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 It is more than half a century since the DPRK suffered from U.S. sanctions.
					
					 Those countries hostile to the DPRK and those ones following the U.S. without any principle have joined the U.S. in its sanctions campaign.
					
					 Neither the UN Charter nor any international convention stipulates that measures of a sovereign state for bolstering up its self-defence capability are subject to sanctions.
					
					 The U.S. cooked up absurd anti-DPRK "sanctions resolutions" at the UN, while shelving its nuclear crimes. This is the height of illegal acts. Its actions are a blatant challenge to the vital rights of the Korean people and acts of destroying modern civilization. The U.S. sanctions amount to an inhumane act of going against civilization aimed at bringing the world back to a mediaeval dark era.
					
					 The U.S. is such mean country that it included rice, daily necessities and even sports apparatuses on the list of sanctions.
					
					 It is working hard to carry out its more sinister scenario to do harm to the sphere related to the living of the Korean people under the pretext of filling up a "vacuum in sanctions".
					
					 It is tragedy for the U.S. to foolishly calculate that it can hurt the DPRK through economic sanctions still now.
					
					 Such desperate efforts of the U.S. would only bring it bitterer shame worldwide.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Withdraw Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Withdraw Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The international community is getting increasingly assertive that it needs to acknowledge the DPRK making signal progress in the development of the national economy and in building of nuclear force, and to be objective and fair in approaching the DPRK, says Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary.
					 The U.S., however, has not yet gotten rid of its old confrontation-minded conception, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Had the Obama administration come to its senses earlier and made even a little effort to approach the DPRK without prejudice, the situation would have not turned such grim as today and the administration would not have suffered such shame as departing from the arena of history leaving its DPRK policy failure.
					
					 The U.S. now finds itself in a nightmare of getting its mainland hit by a nuclear bomb anytime as the DPRK is taking stronger measures to bolster its nuclear force at a high level and asserting its position to make preemptive attack on the former.
					
					 Misguided policy is bound to produce wrong results.
					
					 The U.S. had better bear in mind an aphorism that one who threatens others can not be peaceful oneself.
					
					 It should make a bold decision to withdraw its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK, squarely facing up to the latter's strategic position.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Urged to Halt Saber-rattling
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Urged to Halt Saber-rattling
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- A unit of the south Korean puppet ground force announced some days ago that it would conduct severe winter exercises in areas around Namyangju and Phochon in Kyonggi Province in mid January. They also plan to stage mobile exercises of the aggression troops and military hardware during the period.
					 Earlier, the puppet military warmongers let units on the front stage separate live-shell firing drills of artillery pieces allegedly to annihilate someone, reeking off the smell of powder for invading the north.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday terms this a blatant challenge to the DPRK's magnanimous proposal for taking active steps for defusing acute military conflict and the danger of war between the north and the south.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK that fellow countrymen should not fight each other but safeguard well-being of the nation and preserve peace of the country. This is also the unanimous desire of all the Koreans strongly aspiring after the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 The puppet warmongers, however, are resorting to frantic saber-rattling from the outset of the year in defiance of the sincere call of the DPRK and the demand of the times. This clearly proves before the world who is an arch criminal harassing peace on the Korean peninsula and escalating regional situation.
					
					 If the south Korean puppet forces keep challenging the sincere efforts made by the DPRK to open up a new chapter for the improvement of the north-south relations and the movement for national reunification, that will inevitably spark off a military conflict and war.
					
					 It is only the Korean nation which will sustain the biggest calamity and it is outsiders who will fish in the troubled waters.
					
					 The puppet military warmongers have to come to their senses and stop running wild.

articles.title: Line of Simultaneously Building up Economy and Defence Is Banner of Victory: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Line of Simultaneously Building up Economy and Defence Is Banner of Victory: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The international community is hardly repressing admiration at the miraculous outcome brought about by the DPRK's line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					 Doug Bandow, a U.S. expert on Korean affairs, said that the DPRK keeps successfully pushing forward the line on simultaneous development of the two fronts despite international sanctions, adding that the U.S. has faced the situation in which the supreme leader of the DPRK has set up firm leadership system and brought about sustained prosperity and turned the country into a nuclear weapons state possessed of capabilities for attacking the U.S. mainland.
					
					 The world media including those of Russia and China give wide publicity to the fact that the DPRK's possession of inter-continental ballistic rocket has become an undeniable truth, stressing that its missile and nuclear tests have made much greater progress beyond expectation of experts.
					
					 This is an expression of admiration at the reality in the DPRK making shining successes in economic construction and the building of a nuclear force, a clear proof of the validity and vitality of the Workers' Party of Korea's line on simultaneous development of the two fronts.
					
					 The strategic line is a scientific truth and banner of victory.
					
					 The line calls for cementing the defence capabilities as firm as an iron by bolstering the nuclear force for self-defence and at the same time building a socialist power by putting greater efforts on economic construction.
					
					 The DPRK has been exposed to decades of nuclear threat and blackmail due to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and this has rendered the situation on the Korean peninsula constantly tense in which a thermo-nuclear war may break out any moment.
					
					 The Korean people now face a historic task to end the U.S. nuclear threat, safeguard peace and security in the Korean peninsula and the region and build a prosperous country on this land at any cost.
					
					 The line on simultaneous development of the two fronts has become the most just strategic line and truth for its accurate reflection of the prevailing situation and the requirements of the developing revolution.
					
					 The victory of our strategic line is certain as it is based on the single-minded unity of the army and people working hard in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude, rallied close around the party despite the enemies' harsh obstruction and grim hardship, and the great capacity for self-development.
					
					 The DPRK has towered as a nuclear power in the East which others dare not provoke and a country of Mallima which brings about changes each moment, under the banner of the great line.
					
					 Those who challenge the truth are bound to ruin.
					
					 As long as the U.S. and its vassal forces continue applying nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK and as long as they keep waging nuclear war rackets every year at the doorstep of the DPRK, the latter will continue to bolster the capabilities for self-defence with a main emphasis on the nuclear force, and a preemptive attack.
					
					 The DPRK will certainly emerge as a great political power, military power, socialist economic power and a highly civilized nation with a firm hold on the line on simultaneous development of the two fronts.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Unfair Double-dealing Standard
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Unfair Double-dealing Standard
Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Some countries are vying with each other to test-fire inter-continental ballistic rockets and all other types of rockets.
					The international community is taking note of the fact that the U.S. and the UN Security Council have kept mum about those test-fires while cooking up brigandish "sanctions resolutions" over the regular rocket test-fire by the army of the DPRK and its exercise of the right to launch satellites for peaceful purposes, justified by international law, after labeling them "provocation" and "threat."
					
					Acting by the double-dealing standard unilaterally set by the U.S. in its interests, the UN brands the legitimate exercise of the sovereignty by an independent country as "illegal" and its measure for self-defence "provocation". But some countries are allowed to conduct such test-fires, unhindered. This is a reality on the UN arena at present.
					
					This cannot but be the height of partiality and double-dealing standard and an expression of serious prejudice.
					
					Each country and nation has the same commitments and the same right to exercise in international relations before the international community.
					
					The application of double-dealing standard amounts to hideous arbitrary practices and it is nothing beneficial to the development of international relations at present.
					
					A sovereign state's measures for bolstering up its military capabilities to defend its independence and territorial integrity can never be subject to criticism and interference by the world body under any circumstances.
					
					However, the U.S. has unhesitatingly used its double-dealing standard against those countries aspiring after independence against imperialism with differing ideologies and social systems, utterly disregarding the mission and role of international law and international organizations in pursuance of world hegemony.
					
					Owing to the U.S. reckless moves for bolstering up its nuclear force and modernizing them, the instability and danger of a nuclear war are now escalating on the earth and nuclear weapons states are improving their strategic nuclear forces both in quantity and quality to cope with them.
					
					It was inevitable and entirely just for the DPRK to have had access to nuclear deterrent for self-defence and bolstered up it as it is always exposed to the direct nuclear threat of the U.S. at a time when even those countries having vast territories and big populations and huge economic potentials are giving top priority to the measures for reinforcing nuclear forces for state development and security. 
					
					In order to cope with the evermore escalating U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail, the DPRK succeeded in the test of first H-bomb, test-fire of various offensive means and nuclear warhead explosion and entered the final stage of the preparations for the inter-continental ballistic rocket and achieved signal successes in the field of strategic nuclear force.
					
					The DPRK's measures for bolstering up nuclear force are self-defensive ones to cope with the U.S. vicious nuclear threat and blackmail. They reflect the determination of the army and people of the DPRK to counter nukes and ICBM in kind.
					
					The DPRK has never recognized the unreasonable resolutions adopted by the UNSC against it with the U.S. double-dealing standard.
					
					As long as the imperialists and hegemonic forces scheme to bring down the socialist system in the DPRK, it will further increase its military muscle, protect the peace and security of the country by its own efforts and invariably pursue its line in the future, too.

articles.title: Ban Ki-moon Blamed for Leaving Indelible Stain on UN
articles.content:
Ban Ki-moon Blamed for Leaving Indelible Stain on UN
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean CBS on January 15 revealed that Ban Ki-moon was blamed for failing to timely tackle a civil war of a country, which left many civilians dead, in the period of his office as the UN secretary general.
					 Ban made known his intention to run for "presidential" election, saying that he will use the experience he gained through ten years of his post at UN for the south Korean people.
					
					 But as he took lukewarm approach toward the civil war of a country in 2009, he left an indelible stain on UN so much as to have the case adopted as an official UN document, it pointed out.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Accused of Offering U.S. Exorbitant Amount of Money Collected as Taxes
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Accused of Offering U.S. Exorbitant Amount of Money Collected as Taxes
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Yonhap News on January 15 disclosed that the south Korean warmongers offered the U.S. exorbitant amount of money collected as taxes for a war of aggression after receiving data from the puppet Defense Ministry and the Agency of Defense Affairs.
					 The Agency of Defense Affairs reportedly introduced huge quantities of weapons for aggression from 2006 to October last year, most of which were U.S.-made. The funds spent for purchasing them are almost equivalent to the military spending last year. 
					
					 The amount of the funds spent for purchasing arms sharply jumped under the Park Geun Hye regime, in particular.

articles.title: False Nature of "Ulsa Five-point Treaty" Disclosed by S. Korean Media
articles.content:
False Nature of "Ulsa Five-point Treaty" Disclosed by S. Korean Media
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- It has been disclosed in succession that the Japanese imperialists fabricated "Ulsa Five-point Treaty" in a deceptive and brigandish manner in order to usurp the sovereignty of Korea, according to south Korean media on Monday.
					 An honorary professor at Seoul National University studied the Japanese imperialists' invasion of Korea and related data and made public his findings recently.
					
					 He began studying the case since 1992 when he found a point at issue in the "treaty".
					
					 He looked into the original copy of the "treaty." His study resulted in drawing the conclusion that the "treaty" had neither any ratification by the then Korean Emperor nor carried its title. It was also revealed that the original copy of the Korean version was also written by the Japanese side.
					
					 Another professor at Seoul National University, based on credentials and personal letters the Emperor forwarded to an American missionary and to heads of state of other countries at that time, confirmed that the "treaty" was coercively made up and was not approved by the emperor.
					
					 The coercive nature of the "treaty" was also revealed through a report made by Hasegawa, commander of the Japanese imperialist forces in Korea at that time.
					
					 All this proves that the Japanese imperialists employed the most vicious means and coercive methods to cook up the "treaty" in order to deprive Korea of its sovereignty.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was posted on Russian website Irkutskblogspot. ru on January 9.
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the Workers' Party of Korea is a proud course in which it has led the Korean revolution to victory, being responsible for the people's destiny under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th Congress of WPK Introduced by Regional Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to 7th Congress of WPK Introduced by Regional Body
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee was posted by the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People on its website on January 5.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Hailed Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Hailed Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- A Russian organization and an Egyptian figure hailed the New Year Address made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un. 
					 The Central Committee of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation said in a statement on January 12 that the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un is very significant not only in the struggle of the Korean people but also the world progressive people. It went on:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Un reviewed the achievements made in the struggle for implementing the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea and called for accelerating the victorious advance of socialism.
					
					 He stressed the need to ease the tension on Korean Peninsula, bring about a new turning phase of the independent reunification with the concerted efforts of the nation and for the U.S. imperialists to stop the war games threatening the whole of mankind.
					
					 He also expressed the stand to safeguard the peace and security of the country by steadily bolstering its capabilities for self-defence and preemptive strike.
					
					 We express the belief that the heroic Korean people would certainly carry out the tasks advanced in the New Year Address under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of Egypt-Korea Friendship Association and chairman of the Arab regional preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, said in a statement on Jan. 10 that he was pleased to read the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un, adding the address stressed the need to focus all efforts on implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					
					 He wholeheartedly wished Kim Jong Un good health.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion al Presidente de Turkmenistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion al Presidente de Turkmenistan 
Pyongyang, 17 de enero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC, remitio el dia 10 un mensaje de felicitacion al Presidente de Turkmenistan, Gurbanguly Berdymuhamedov.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 25o aniversario de establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre la RPDC y Turkmenistan, extiendo cordiales felicitaciones a Vd. y al pueblo de su pais. 
					
					Convencido de que las relaciones bilaterales de amistad y cooperacion con larga historia continuaran desarrollandose positivamente conforme al ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad y a los intereses de los pueblos de ambos paises, formulo votos por los exitos en sus responsabilidades.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del Presidente de Turkmenistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del Presidente de Turkmenistan
Pyongyang, 17 de enero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le remitiera el dia 10 el Presidente de Turkmenistan, Gurbanguly Berdymuhamedov.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					En ocasion del 25o aniversario del establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas entre Turkmenistan y la RPDC, extiendo sinceras felicitaciones y excelentes votos a Vd. y al pueblo de su pais en nombre del pueblo y el gobierno de Turkmenistan y en el mio propio. 
					
					Nuestros dos paises mantienen relaciones amistosas y cooperativas a base de la lucha conjunta por el respeto mutuo, la igualdad, el progreso y el desarrollo. 
					
					Turkmenistan esta interesado en seguir fortaleciendo las relaciones bilaterales y las de acompanantes fructiferas con su pais. 
					
					Estamos dispuestos a ampliar la cooperacion entre dos paises. 
					
					Estoy convencido de que las relaciones entre Turkmenistan y la RPDC seguiran desarrollandose conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de dos paises. 
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, deseo de todo corazon la paz, el bienestar y la prosperidad a Su Excelencia y al amistoso pueblo de su pais.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo vicepremier coreano
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo vicepremier coreano
Pyongyang, 17 de enero (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publicado el dia 17, Jon Kwang Ho fue designado como viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC.

articles.title: ACNC critica en comentario la pauta de doble rasero de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC critica en comentario la pauta de doble rasero de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 17 de enero (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, algunos paises realizan a porfia los lanzamientos de prueba de cohetes de diversos tipos, inclusive el balistico intercontinental.
					Llama la atencion de la sociedad internacional el hecho de que a pesar de lo mencionado, se mantienen callados Estados Unidos y el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que fabricaron caso por caso la bandidesca "resolucion de sancion" contra la RPDC describiendo como "provocacion" y "amenaza" los rutinarios ejercicios de lanzamiento de cohetes del Ejercito Popular de Corea y hasta el ejercicio del derecho al disparo de satelites con fines pacificos, legalizado por el derecho internacional.
					
					A conveniencia de EE.UU. y segun su pauta de doble rasero, el ejercicio de los derechos soberanos de un Estado soberano y sus medidas de autodefensa se califican de "acto ilegal" y "provocacion", pero en el caso de otro pais se le da la luz verde en las mismas cuestiones. Esto es lo que sucede ahora en la escena de la ONU.
					
					Es el climax de parcialidad y pauta de doble rasero y evidente muestra de prejuicio.
					
					Son iguales los deberes de los paises y naciones asumidos ante la sociedad internacional y sus derechos en las relaciones internacionales.
					
					La aplicacion de la pauta de dualidad es una arbitrariedad extremada que resulta inutil para el desarrollo de las actuales relaciones internacionales.
					
					No pueden ser criticadas e intervenidas en ningun caso por la organizacion internacional las medidas para fortalecer la capacidad de autodefensa nacional de un Estado soberano para defender la soberania y la integridad territorial.
					
					Sin embargo, en su afan por tomar la heguemonia mundial, EE.UU. vino aplicando sin vacilacion alguna la pauta de doble rasero contra los paises aspirantes a la independencia antiimperialista, que tienen ideas y regimenes diferentes a los suyos, sin tomar en consideracion la mision y el papel de las leyes y organizaciones internacionales.
					
					Actualmente, debido a las imprudentes maniobras de EE.UU. destinadas a aumentar y modernizar las fuerzas armadas nucleares, se agrandan cada dia mas la inestabilidad mundial y el peligro de guerra nuclear. 
					
					Por su parte, los paises poseedores de armas nucleares mejoran cuantitativa y cualitativamente sus fuerzas nucleares estrategicas para hacerle frente.
					
					Dan prioridad a esa labor hasta los paises grandes en el territorio nacional, la poblacion y la potencialidad economica para el desarrollo y la seguridad del Estado.
					
					Es inevitable y justa tal opcion tomada por la RPDC que sufre permanentemente la directa amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Frente a la escalada de amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU., nuestro pais realizo con exito la prueba de bomba H, las otras de lanzamiento experimental de diversos medios de ataque y la prueba de explosion de ojiva nuclear e impulsa en la fase final los preparativos de lanzamiento de prueba de cohete balistico intercontinental, entre otros exitos considerables alcanzados en el sector de fuerzas nucleares estrategicas.
					
					Nuestras medidas para fortalecerlas tienen el caracter autodefensivo frente a la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. y reflejan la decision del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos de responder con el arma nuclear y el cohete balistico intercontinental a los mismos armamentos.
					
					No reconocemos nunca las injustas resoluciones del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU fabricadas hasta la fecha.
					
					Mientras continue la campana de los imperialistas y dominacionistas para aplastar el regimen socialista de la RPDC, esta fortalecera aun mas la capacidad militar y defendera con fuerzas propias la paz y seguridad del Estado manteniendo su linea.
